    • 方法详细资料

      • setCountriesInContinents

        public void setCountriesInContinents(java.util.Scanner input)
                              throws CannotFindException,
                                     DuplicatesException
        This method sets the neighbor for each country.
        参数:
        input - Scanner of the input text file
        抛出:
        CannotFindException - Exception thrown when file formatting is wrong
        DuplicatesException - Exception thrown when a country appears more than once in the map

      • setNeighboringCountries

        public void setNeighboringCountries(java.util.Scanner input)
                             throws CannotFindException
        This method checks that each continent has predefined number of countries. Throws error if formatting of text file is wrong or number of country in each continent does not equal predefined number.
        参数:
        input - The country name the player input
        抛出:
        CannotFindException - Exception thrown when formatting is wrong each continent does not equal predefined number

      • init

        public boolean init(java.util.Scanner input)
             throws CannotFindException,
                    DuplicatesException
        This method is called to parse a file
        参数:
        input - file to be parsed
        返回:
        true if the file has been parsed correctly, otherwise exception thrown
        抛出:
        CannotFindException - Exception thrown when invalid formatting of file
        DuplicatesException - Exception thrown when duplicate country in continents
